label: ball
caption: In the lush green field, three rambunctious little girls with dark hair were chasing each other in a joyful game of tag. One of them suddenly stopped and picked up a bright red ball that had been left behind, prompting her friends to burst into laughter as they all joined in the fun. The warm sunlight highlighted the vibrant colors of their clothes and the lush grass beneath their feet, capturing the carefree essence of childhood playtime.
